alert.note: Alert for Coastal Cameron; Coastal Willacy; Inland Cameron; Inland Willacy (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 08 at 9:21AM CST until January 08 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Brownsville
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST TODAY... * WHAT...South winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 40 mph. * WHERE...Inland Willacy, Inland Cameron, Coastal Willacy, and Coastal Cameron Counties. * WHEN...Until noon CST today. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Wind gusts of 40 to perhaps 45 mph will continue from the south until late morning or early afternoon before dropping back soon after to 15 to 25 mph with a few gusts to 30 mph. Strong northwest winds will follow a cold front this evening, and another wind advisory for this situation is likely for all or parts of the area.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Keep outdoor objects tied down.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Cameron; Coastal Willacy; Inland Cameron; Inland Willacy
